attributes.action: investiage why the social services are so corrupt
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: social services have got blood on their hands from the hands of many babies whom have been removed without parental consent and discrimnated against mainly fathers, they live under the pretext of what is in the child's best intrests but how can removing a child from birth and forcing adoption from their biological parents be in the child's best intrest when it is scientifically proven that it does alot more harm than good to the children in question.

rejection.details: We cannot verify some of the claims in your petition so cannot accept it as it is currently worded. You may wish to reword your petition or sign an existing petition on the site requesting changes to social services eg http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/ReformIt/
reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
